Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Technique: WRITTEN WITH A REED PEN/REED WITH SPLIT NIB
Name: Documentary papyrus
Description: Documentary papyrus. The sums made out in talents and drachmas are also considerable. It needs to be underscored that the third line of the fragment would have contained an "equivalence" in drachmas of copper, had the right extremity not been destroyed. Negligible and illegible traces of faded texts exist on the verso.
